codes:
import math
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

n=int(input())
r=10**9+7
fact=[1]
for i in range(1,int(math.sqrt(n))+1):
	fact.append((fact[-1]*i)%r)
fact=list(map(lambda x:x%r,fact))

dp=[0]*(n+1)
dp[0]=1
for i in range(1,n+1):
	k=fact[i]
	for j in range(i,n+1):
		dp[j]=dp[j-k]
		if dp[j]>=r:
			dp[j]+=k*fact[i]
			
print(dp[n])
